subject: Automobile Racing
Virtual Reality (Computers)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Several high-profile Nascar drivers own sophisticated simulated racing units that cost thousands of dollars and are designed to mimic the feel of real racecars.
snippet: Several high-profile Nascar drivers own sophisticated simulated racing units that cost thousands of dollars and are designed to mimic the feel of real racecars.
